nodes.text: Trollbane were a predatory species native to the planet Weik in Wild Space.

A stony-skinned bipedal creature, trollsbane were native to the Ordan Spine Mountains on the planet Weik. Formerly an apex predator, the non-intelligent species was dominated by the colonists who crashlanded on the planet. Attacking farms and villages that were isolated in the mountains, the trollbanes kept to the caves of Crysifal Peak. The legendary heroes of Weik were often depicted as killing trollbanes at the start of their careers.
